Libido (nke a makwaara dị ka Mareqo, Mareko) bụ asụsụ Afroasiatic nke Ethiopia, nke a na-asụ na mpaghara Mareko Gurage nke Southern Nations, Nationalities, na People's Region, kpọmkwem na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Butajira. O nwere ihe dị ka ndị na-asụ asụsụ puku iri isii na anọ (nchịkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ nke afọ 2007).
Ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Hadiyya (otu olumba site na Blench 2006) n'ime asụsụ Highland East Cushitic
Nkọwa okwu ya bụ SOV; ngwaa ya nwere ihe na-adịghị arụ ọrụ, ihe na-agbanwe agbanwe na ihe na-akpata ya, yana olu dị n'etiti.
